chunk-6975851757c6446b3d125faf6e138fff.description: The People’s Republic of China is referred to as a country that poses a long-term challenge to the United States, with intentions to reshape the international order.

chunk-482a673ea465bed4ba268da1d3fef2fa.description: Eric Adams is the Mayor of New York City, whose Education Department reported to the state that the yeshiva was complying with a law requiring private schools. He is also referred to as Mayor Adams.
